profile: With over 40 years of experience...Full Service Plumbing and Drain,residential and commercial.  Licensed Master Plumber, bonded and insured. No job is too small, doing repairs, installations and full replacement of any kind of pipes, fixtures, faucets, drain/ SEWER PIPES replacements and installation(trench-less using Hydraulic or Pneumatic "Pipe Burst"  or not),BACKWATER VALVES,  WATER SERVICES(trench-less using Torpedo technology), interior or exterior waterproofing and SUMP PIT and SUMP PUMP installation, BATTERY BACK UP SUMP PUMP systems (also covered by City of Toronto rebates up to 80%) and more....Free estimates for service calls ONLY 9am-4pm M-F. We service all GTA
service_area: TORONTO, NORTH YORK,EAST YORK, SCARBOROUGH, ETOBICOKE, MISSISSAUGA (EAST only), VAUGHAN, RICHMOND HILL, WOODBRODGE, KLEINBURG, MAPLE, CONCORD, Markham,  ALL G.T.A. (no Brampton or Oakville, sorry)
products: We never cut corners or use cheap parts to save a buck! We only use top quality plumbing materials on all of our projects.  Kohler, Wirsbo, Moen, Delta, Price Pfister, KWC, Grohe, ... just to name a few.
services:
-Main drains, sewer lines repairs and full replacements
- Video Camera inspections and locations for sewer lines and blockages in sewer lines
-Back Water Valves installation (up to $1250.00 rebate from City of Toronto
- Pipe Burst Hydraulic and/or Pneumatic used to replace old clay sewer lines trenchless
- Video Camera Inspection for underground drains, also location of the pipes available
- Install new Mixing Valves (above Hot Water Tank) , best made in US , Apollo brand, THERMOSTATIC MIXING VALVE 3/4" HYDRONIC SERIES . 
- Interior or exterior waterproofing complete with Sump Pit and sump pumps, battery back up sump pump systems Liberty 441, also Liberty Pumps 442-25A 25 Amp Standard Model StormCell 12V Battery Backup System,Liberty SJ10 water operated back up sump pump, all covered by City of Toronto rebates under "Basement Flooding Program" , up to 1750$. 
- copper water lines repairs, Main Shutoff valves replacements, Pressure Reducing Valves, install new sinks, vanities, faucets, drains, repairs if parts are still available. We also offer a 170$ service cost to clean Backwater Valves, recommended to be done once a year. 
 City of Markham is offering now rebates for Backwater Valves installed on Sewer or Storm lines up to 3500$ or even more if installed outdoor.

profile:
Award Plus Plumbing plumbers work very hard to bring exceptional customer service that guarantees your satisfaction - it’s our number one priority. You can depend on our professional plumbing technicians that will provide you with a right solution to solve any problems. We are dedicated to your satisfaction and get the job done right. Your safety comes first - we care about your safety, comfort and peace of mind.
 
When there is an emergency, you don’t want to deal with an unprofessional and unpleasant person when you call for help. And the last thing that you don’t need is to wait. We assure you the person that will greet you on the phone will take care of you and ensure you get our professional plumbing technician right away. 
 
If you prefer to hire a professional plumber that can fix your problem and whose priority is respecting you and your home, then Award Plus Plumbing is the number 1 choice with over  25 years of experience.

profile:
DIMA PLUMBING is a licensed Master Plumber and OWWA Backflow Preventer with over 20 years of experience, bonded and insured 
 After working with one of the leading plumbing companies in Toronto I’ve decided to run my own plumbing business to offer the same high quality of service at a more affordable price. Since every situation different, I provide a variety of services, tailored for your specific need and budget; new installations, repairs, or replacements of any kind such as drains, fixtures, water services and more. 
 Your business and time is valued and you will be as informed as possible as per your options before any work is done so that your satisfaction is guaranteed. 
 Estimates are free of charge.
products:
Free Home Inspection* Help avoid potential plumbing problems with a FREE home plumbing and safety inspection with any service call.
 *Conditions apply; please call for details.

brands: American Standard, Toto, Kohler Moen, Delta, Pricepfister, Proflo, Fluidmaster, Grohe, Riobel, Rubinet, Aquabrass, KWC, OS&B, Dahl, Rheem, Zurn, Watts, Combraco. We also install customer supplied specialty faucets.
specialities: We offers backflow prevention solutions to help you protect your drinking water from pollution and other contamination usually caused by backflow or crossconnection. We install, test, and repair your backflow prevention products. We can also offer backflow or backwater valve for sewage backup protection. While valves can vary in complexity and ease of operation, you can trust our services to find the best valve for your needs and instruct you on how to properly operate it.

profile:
WE are open 24/7. We currently have safety procedures in place and are operating contact free service. At Hoerner Plumbing, there is an operator on Duty 24/7, so you will always speak with a person, we will provide you with an exact 2 hour arrival window, our trucks are well stocked, often we can do it all with just one service call,  we clean up so well and it is like we were never there.
 
Services that we provide for PLUMBING are, Install & repair toilet.
Install & repair faucets, Install service to tankless water heaters Install Sewage ejectors as well as install sump pump.
Services that we provide for HEATING are Install service to tankless water heater. Install & service high efficiency boilers for your home. Boiler Service. Service to radiant floor heating systems.
Install & repair Radiators.
Services that we provide for DRAINS are: service to clogged pipes and drains. Camera inspection of drains. Install repair main line backwater valves to protect your home from city back-up.
Install & service to sewage ejector & sump pumps. Hydronic heating or hot water heating
 
Yes! Andrew Hoerner Pledges 100% Satisfaction Guarantee, or we will redo the repair for no added fee.

Canadian Rooter is your local-Canadian-family owned business! Servicing Toronto & the GTA (radius of 80 km) , we specialize in all major UNDERGROUND and minor plumbing and drain projects, basement waterproofing.  We offer Exceptional customer service, outstanding work quality and warranty.  We offer free estimates with no obligations related to all underground projects.  We view all problems as obstacles and will leave you with a piece of mind!



We do All household plumbing service calls by Appointment ONLY

Services we provide: 
    * Drain Cleaning
    * Camera Inspection

profile:
Welcome to Canada Waterproofers, your one stop shop for all your waterproofing, plumbing and drain repair needs. Canada Waterproofers provide top-quality material and service. With over 25 years experience we know what products, methods and application works best for your unique situation.

Canada Waterproofers specialize in helping you with all your Waterproofing Drain and Plumbing needs. For 25 years servicing the local community with pride.

We believe that high quality workmanship and materials are key to get he job done right the first time. Canada Waterproofers treat our customers homes as if it was our own. From complete home waterproofing to minor repairs…we do it right!

Canada Waterproofers believes in old school values, this is very important in a business filled with dishonesty and careless workmanship.

Here at Canada Waterproofers we are proud of our work, and love to share every step of the job with our customers. Doing this they can understand and be involved on how the job being performed and applies to their unique situation. 

Canada Waterproofers can help you with any project big or small, and are always just a phone call away to answer any questions or concerns. 

We believe in personalization so when you call our company we won’t send you a sales person. We believe that this is unfair to our customers as we are not interested in just selling a job, but rather figuring out what the problem is at your home and offering the best solution.

Benefits to our customers


25 Year Transferable warranty provided
Over 25-years experience in the industry.
We are fully licensed, insured and have full WSIB coverage
Highly trained technicians that are licensed plumbers and waterproofers.
Building renovators licenses.
Underpinning experts.
We will detect any water leakage on your property, and fix it the first time!
Free non- obligation estimate is provided to all costumers. 
We use the latest technology available to make sure our services are top quality.
We only repair what is required, at very competitive prices. Saving homeowners thousands of dollars.

Integrity, Honesty and the highest quality workmanship within the industry. Canada Waterproofers is here for you. 

Canada Waterproofers will provide a free no obligation written quote before any work is performed. Once you decide to go ahead with the work rest assured one of our technicians will be constantly monitoring the onsite site activity to be sure that the work is performed to our high standards. 

Our technicians pride themselves attending to the smallest of details. Nothing is left to chance therefore ensuring your project is completed to the highest standards.

Here are just some services that we provide

Exterior waterproofing
Interior waterproofing
Sump pump installations
Sump pump battery back up systems
Backflow preventers 
Snaking
Camera inspections
Plumbing
And more...

The Team at Canada Waterproofers will only be content when our customers are happy. It’s important our company constantly keeps up our high quality in workmanship and materials to be sure that our customers are completely satisfied now and in the future.

The climate is changing and the challenge of keeping our aging homes becomes more of an issue. Canada Waterproofers are up for the task. Your basement will stay dry and your plumbing will perform properly for years to come. Choose Canada Waterproofers.
www.canadawaterproofers.com/basementwaterproofing

profile:
About The Great Plumbing Co.
Why waste time looking around for a plumber while your plumbing problem gets worse? The Great Plumbing Co. provides the fast, friendly expertise you need when there’s no time to wait.
***
The Great Plumbing Co. is a 100% locally owned and operated Canadian based plumbing company. For nearly three decades, we have been proudly serving residents in Toronto, ON and the greater Toronto area, solving their residential and commercial plumbing problems.
***
As a full-service plumbing company focused on providing high quality plumbing solutions and unbeatable customer care, there is no job too small or too large for us to handle. Whether it’s a small repair, full installation or remodeling project, we will always take the time to listen to your concerns, and work with you to decide on a cost-effective solution.
***
Trusted Plumbing Experts Since 1989
When we opened our doors in 1989, Founder and Master Plumber, Jeff Wright set out with the goal of helping homeowners in the greater Toronto area with their residential plumbing needs. Providing value for the customer with a respectful, professional, and quality service approach has always been his top priority from the start.
***
Several years after we started The Great Plumbing Co., industry was booming in the GTA and we saw an even greater need outside the residential plumbing space. Thus, we shifted our attention to provide general contracting for local business owners. Fast forward to 1999 when we took the opportunity to become involved with the city’s development, providing CCTV inspection and cleaning of large diameter sewers.
***
While we gained valuable experience from working in the commercial and industrial space, today we are happy to be back to our roots focused on helping homeowners with their residential plumbing needs. We’ve been able to help thousands of homeowners ease the inconvenience that plumbing issues can cause and keep their appliances and fixtures running flawlessly.
***
What Can You Expect from Us?
When you call The Great Plumbing Co., you’ll speak with a friendly, knowledgeable advisor. Upon your request, we will be happy to send a licensed and insured plumber who will be able to answer your questions and provide you with a written quote for the work required.
***
Enjoy the benefits of working with a reliable, professional plumbing company that prioritizes your needs:
***
VIP Treatment on Every Call
On-time Arrival and Fast Turnarounds
Friendly, Local Experts
Licensed and Insured
Cutting-Edge Technology
24/7 Emergency Service
100% Satisfaction Guaranteed
No Mess
***
Service Areas
Toronto • North York • Richmond Hill • Markham • Leaside • East York, Ajax, Brampton, Etobicoke, Vaughan, Oakville, Pickering, Scarborough, Thornhill, Richmond Hill

profile:
WaterWorks Plumbing & Drains.
A plumbing company is only as good as its reputation, which is why we stake everything on ours. We’re not typical, and we don’t just throw words around to impress you. When we say expertise, affordability and satisfaction, we mean it. Ever heard of a 101% satisfaction guarantee? That’s what we offer. So what’s the extra one percent? It’s everything that makes us unique. We aren’t just plumbers. We are home comfort specialists, dedicated to solving the problems that cause you constant headaches. We have over 19 years of committed service to the Greater Toronto area and know what it takes to get the job done right in the most cost-effective way possible. We live in your neighbourhood and understand your needs. Being family-owned and operated keeps us grounded and accountable. To earn your trust, we fix the problem the first time – always leaving your home better, cleaner and safer than it was before. We take a high-quality, no pressure approach to all of our jobs, including:
•	Solving High Water Bills

profile:
DrainWorks Plumbing is a customer-first, Toronto-based plumbing company providing full plumbing services, drain cleaning, drain repair and drain replacement. All our plumbers are 100% licensed, insured and commission-free! We take great pride in being one of the most reviewed companies on HomeStars in North America! We are also proud to say that we have been chosen (twice) as the "best plumber in the city" by Toronto Life magazine, as evidenced by their "Busy person's survival guide" issue. High praise from a wonderful and trusted publication! 

We employ full-time salaried plumbers rather than commission-based plumbers that are motivated to up-sell you. All of the DrainWorks plumbers in Toronto and surrounding areas are fully licensed, insured, and professionally trained. We are also proud to say that 100% of our employees have been with us for 10 years or more. Finally, an experienced local plumber near you that you can trust and rely on!
 
Further, we've recently had the honor of being one of a select few companies across all trades, hand picked by Gemini award winning TV host and contractor, Bryan Baeumler, of HGTV's Leave it to Bryan and Disaster DIY to be Baeumler Approved. A high mark of quality, indeed. 
 
You can count on DrainWorks for all your plumbing and drain-related needs in Toronto. Our plumbers are ready for your call with clear and upfront pricing and will always arrive on-time and fully prepared with everything they can foreseeably need.

DrainWorks Plumbing also likes to help and support our local Toronto community and charities, such as for the Easter Seals and SickKids Foundation.
Please take a few moments to read these plumbing reviews from our customers, so you too can learn about and take advantage of the ‘DrainWorks Difference’. We hope you choose us for your next call to the plumber!

**COVID-19 UPDATE - DrainWorks Plumbing is open and in full operation adhering to all Covid-19 protocols in place to offer the help you need when you need it most keeping everyone safe.**

By using the most recent technology we can offer you the best service to ensure your plumbing work is done efficiently and with quality. We provide free estimates, competitive rates, and city rebates are available.
Our services include waterproofing, pipe burst, plumbing repairs, backwater valve, concrete work, water service and repairs, drain camera inspections, drain snaking, and underpinning (basement lowering).
With appointments booked at your convenience, and 24 hour emergency service, you’re sure to get the job done with Tornado Plumbing.

Check us out here:
https://www.facebook.com/TornadoPlumbingCom
https://twitter.com/TornadoPlumbing
https://www.instagram.com/tornado_plumbing/

YouTube videos on various plumbing and drain services may be found in our photo gallery.
services:
Waterproofing
Our skilled crews take all the necessary steps to clean and prepare your foundation wall prior to waterproofing.
We only use materials of the highest industry standard to seal your home from leaks.
With a 25 year warranty, you are guaranteed a dry basement and piece of mind.

Drains
When you need to replace your damaged sewer lines, we meet all city standards for drain work and backwater valves.
Using the minimally invasive pipe burst method, we can have your drains running again quickly.

Water Service
Using trench-less technology we can quickly replace your lead waterline or
upgrade your current water service, causing minimal damage to your property

Plumbing
We can take care of all your plumbing needs no matter the size.
Fixing small leaks to full plumbing line replacement, and everything in between.

Concrete work
From walkways to patio slabs we’ve got all your concrete needs covered.

Underpinning & Walkouts
If you’re looking for more living space, we can lower your basement to your desired height or add a second entrance.
Using approved engineer drawings, and following building codes, we will create the basement you want.

24/7 EMERGENCY SERVICE

profile:
AtlasCare has been a family-run local business for 88 years with one goal: to always be there when you need us. As an essential service, we may be needed now more than ever. A breakdown or necessary replacement of your HVAC or plumbing system can be critical - especially as many of us are still confined to our homes. At AtlasCare we are dedicated to the health and safety of our team members, our customers and our community. That's why we're taking extensive precautions before we enter your home bu disinfecting trucks and tools, washing hands, wearing proper protection equipment, and disinfecting anything we touch. Most of the work we do does not require any interaction with customers - approvals and payments are contactless. 
⁣
When you book an appointment:⁣
⁣
- We send you a photo of the technician who will be visiting your home. ⁣
- We let you know we’re on the way and show up on time. ⁣
- We lay down a red carpet and wear booties over our shoes to protect your floors. ⁣
- We clean up when we’re finished so you’d never know we were there.⁣
⁣
Since 1932, families in the Greater Toronto Area have counted on AtlasCare to provide exceptional ⁣
heating, cooling and ventilation products, including furnace repair, air conditioner service, water heater ⁣
maintenance, smart thermostat installation, plumbing, drain clearing and more.⁣
⁣
Our exceptional service and support team has received recognition from numerous consumer and industry ⁣
awards, including:⁣
⁣
- HomeStars Best of 2020 Award (GTA) ⁣
- Top Choice Air Conditioning and Heating Company of 2020 in the Greater Toronto Area ⁣
- 2020 Consumer Choice Award for Air Conditioning and Heating Contractors in the Greater Toronto Area ⁣
- 2019 Mississauga and Brampton's Readers' Choice Award ⁣
- 2019 Lennox Partner of the Year Award (Toronto District)⁣
⁣
Call AtlasCare 24/7 for award-winning furnace, air conditioning, plumbing or duct cleaning service in the Greater ⁣Toronto Area.

We hope you will give us the opportunity to prove to you that we are a quality company.

profile:
Thank You for considering Advanced Plumbing. Most people do not know what is more distressing A) Having a plumbing problem or B) Having a pushy salesman in their home selling excessive services at outrageous prices. Advanced plumbing operates differently. Our family run business with two generations of plumbers take pride …

No more unattended drainage problem resulting in slow running drains especially in the kitchen, laundry and bathrooms. Snaking is often successful but hydro jetting could be the answer to remove oil and grease settled in the drain.

Let Advanced Plumbing analyze and diagnose your drain buildup, blockages, or cracks in the pipes which can lead to overflowing sinks and backed-up toilets. Prevent a catastrophic sewer flood by installing an inexpensive backwater valve.

Let us stop your toilet from constantly running or from the tank filling up on its own. We can service or if required replace your toilet.

Whether you are renovating your house or splurging on a new shower, take advantage of our bathtub and shower installation services.

We pride ourselves in providing to our customers the highest standards in customer care throughout the process. We will provide exceptional "beyond the call of duty" services to all our customers. From Plumbing, Basement Lowering and Underpinning to new basement Floor Upgrades and Drain issues to Wet Basement Waterproofing, Rooter-Man can handle and specializes in these services and more!

profile:
Marco Plumbing is a well-respected, full-service plumbing company servicing both residential and commercial clients in the Durham, Peterborough, Scarborough and Toronto Area. A highly service-oriented company, Marco Plumbing’s team of fully licensed, professional plumbers draws on shared experience, expertise, and commitment to quality to deliver worry-free plumbing services to homeowners, commercial businesses, and property managers.

Mark Fermo, owner and founder of Marco Plumbing, leads the award-winning and reputable company with a focus on providing unmatched customer service. With over 20 years of professional plumbing experience, Mark is backed by a team of experienced, reliable, fully licensed and insured, professional plumbers who proudly wear the Marco Plumbing uniform.

As Durham’s most affordable plumbing company, Marco Plumbing has raised the bar for plumber and drain services in Whitby, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Markham, Scarborough, Pickering, Ajax, Oshawa and Toronto and the surrounding areas for over 10 years.

profile:
At Reliance, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are synonymous for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

Reliance Home Comfort has been delivering high quality home comfort products and services for over 40 years. Specializing in furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters and plumbing, we provide our customers with peace of mind and are with you every step of the way. When you choose Reliance, you’re choosing one of the largest HVAC providers in Canada, with over 1.7 million customers and growing. You can expect your call to be answered 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. With one of the largest networks of licensed technicians in Canada, we respond to over 500,000 service calls each year. 
After all, we believe you are investing in much more than home comfort equipment, you’re investing in a relationship and your satisfaction is our top priority.
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!

profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs

profile:
We are open to serve you during the COVID-19. Fully prepared, COVID-19 ready and committed to serve you while your health and safety remain our top priority. 

****

We are reputable plumbing, waterproofing and underpinning company that offers top services and affordable prices that help you save money and guarantee quality results. We guarantee you Peace of Mind. 

We are family based business that works on independent basis therefore we are able to compete in prices and offer our customers non-beatable quotes. No high prices, no aggressive sales, no commission based contractors, and no pressure – it is our policy. 

Our company is an expert in all areas of plumbing (residential, high-end commercial & industrial), waterproofing (exterior & interior waterproofing), all foundation repairs, drain repairs, underpinning and basement lowering. Our wide range of services includes thorough diagnostics, camera inspections & no dig technologies – air lining pipe bursting, which save your landscape and provide clean results. If you require free estimate simply give us a call and our licensed technician will discuss your needs, work within your budget and offer an effective solution. Our job speaks for itself. Once you call us you will be worries free. Call today 647-408-3262 or 647-297-6947
We run our business with integrity and treat our customers with respect. 

We GUARANTEE YOU PEACE OF MIND at a fraction of the cost.

products: We are the EXCLUSIVE carrier and the ONLY distributor of the top of the line newest technology moisture meters (designed and manufactured in Europe) - deep probing, non destructive and accurate; which we use to detect and to measure the amount of moisture in concrete and other building materials. When you are purchasing a house or you are concerned about dampness and moisture in the walls (especially basement), contact us to inspect the walls with one of our meters! 100% Accurate! No faulty results! This will save your money!

profile:
Plumber and Plumbing Company specialising in all brands of fixtures. We are a recommended service company for many high end fixture and faucet manufacturers including Rubinet, Riobel, Aquabrass, Grohe , Duravit and many others. We are knowledgeable in many other leading names in the industry. We stock a wide selection of spares and can source most components. We offer great service and good value. We are not connected to any large franchises.

COVID_19
Aviv Plumbing Inc takes the COVID-19 pandemic very seriously. In order to protect both our clients and our team, we have implemented a strategic plan regarding service calls.
Apart from the usual hand washing and cleaning that has always been a part of our procedure, we are also imposing a series of questions at the time of booking calls. These are questions outlined by the government of Canada https://www.canada.ca/home.html follow the links to COVID-19.
Our staff will clean all tools between jobs and will be wearing masks. If you have a call booked and have answered "yes" to any of the questions or have not been feeling well, please call and postpone your service call.
As a service company, we cannot work remotely and self isolation will be devastating to us.
Thank you for your understanding and cooperation at this time.

profile: Throughout the Greater Toronto area, we offer a full range of Plumbing services. With our licensed & Insured Plumbers, you can be assured of getting quality workmanship. We offer fully guaranteed, fast and efficient service. In delivering our services, we are: KNOWLEDGEABLE: We use our knowledge, experience and expertise to provide quality services. RESPONSIVE AND TIMELY: We will respond to our clients in a timely, courteous, and fair manner. PROFESSIONAL: We treat all clients with respect and dignity. HELPFUL: We strive to be available to our clients and support them by providing clear, accurate and relevant information about our services. ACCESSIBLE: Our services are delivered in a manner that promotes participation of persons with disabilities and considers their expectations of dignity, independence and integration. We take pride in a job well done and value our clients trust. Every project great or small is equally important to us. Drains Our plumbing company has handled every kind of clogged drain and sewer. We offer a complete residential, commercial & industrial drain maintenance service which includes: clearing, cleaning, lining, power flush and replacing broken drains. We realize that having a blocked drain is unpleasant and should be fixed quickly, so we offer a fast & convenient way to get things solved! Drain & Sewer Video Inspection If you’re experiencing reoccurring issues with your sewer system, a video inspection might be the right solution to diagnose the core of your drainage issue. During the video inspection process, we inspect the drain system to identify the exact cause of the problem whether, whether it be a clog, root intrusions, or cracked, crushed or misaligned pipes. In addition to current home owners utilizing our video inspection service, many prospective home buyers use our video inspection service when considering buying a home. It offers piece of mind when buying a home. It also allows the home seller to provide reassurance to any prospective buyer. Plumbing So, whether you have a big or small job, we are able to help. Our range of Plumbing services includes the following: *Installation of Plumbing Fixtures *Water leak diagnostic and repair *New construction plumbing *Leaking tap repair *Hydronic Heating System *Hot- Water Tank, supply and installation *Garburator installation and repair *Burst pipe repair *Hose bib repair and installation *Toilet installation and repair *Thawing Frozen Pipe *Back Flow Prevention *Water proofing *Water Jetter *Saniflo toilet installation and repair *Sump & sewage pump installation and repair *Sewer and storm drain maintenance *Drain replacement *Drain repairs *Drain lining (Trench less pipe lining) *Drain pipe torpedo *Drain locate and diagnostic *Detailed Conditions of all Drain Lines *Complete Inspection Reports Outlining any Issues with the System *Video recording is provided of the drain inspection (If needed) *And much more! profile:
In business since 2000, we have established ourselves as leading and reliable providers of plumbing services to residential and commercial clients. We offer experienced, expert service - no plumbing job is beyond our range. We can take care of any plumbing issues you may have from routine upkeep to major emergency repairs.
 
When you need a plumber for emergency repairs, you may not be able to wait until morning, that's why we provide a 24/7 on-call service to help you keep your home or office comfortable. We can help by repairing and replacing leaking faucets, running toilets, water heaters, shower heads, broken water pipes, kitchen and bathroom sinks.
In addition, we offer complete plumbing and drain services, bathroom and kitchen remodeling, drain line inspections and pipe locating, and installation and repair of electric water heaters.
 
Whether you are a homeowner or business-owner in Toronto or the surrounding area, you can count on our professionals to provide personal attention to quality and unmatched service.

       • Servicing the Greater Toronto Area
       • Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed

profile:
ABOUT GOLD MEDAL PLUMBING AND DRAIN
THE NO. 1 DRAIN & PLUMBING COMPANY IN MISSISSAUGA
At Gold Medal Plumbing and Drain, we’re all about helping homeowners save time and money. If you are experiencing problems with your plumbing, make your life a whole lot easier and give us a call. From clogged drains to leaky pipes to water heater issues and more, we work hard to provide fast, effective service options at an affordable price.

Dealing with a plumbing problem is one of the most annoying issues homeowners face. Leave it to the experts at Gold Medal Plumbing and Drain to help you solve the problem in no time.

Call (416) 800-6264 today or contact us online to schedule an appointment in Mississauga or the surrounding areas.

SOLVING PLUMBING PROBLEMS FOR THREE DECADES
Since we opened our doors, we have been helping area homeowners keep their plumbing systems running safely and efficiently. After many years in the plumbing industry, we have gained a wealth of expertise you can’t get from a book. We’ve seen it all and have gained a depth of understanding to know what works and what does not in any given situation.

Our loyal customer base exists for a reason. They know that no matter what, we work hard at any problem until we solve it. Our customers have confidence in us because we treat each situation as unique and provide personalized options for repair or replacement.

HIGHLY RATED ON BBB & HOMESTARS
We’re proud of our reputation and glad when we’re recognized for our hard work. HomeStars and the Better Business Bureau have both rated us highly for our fast arrivals, competitive pricing, and high-quality workmanship.

We know that our customers don’t like to waste their time, so we get straight to the heart of the issue and provide a cost-effective solution to the problem. Homeowners never have to worry whether we have their best interests in mind. We always give our customers options and guide them by recommending what we believe from decades of experience is the right service for their specific plumbing needs.

GIVE US A CALL!
When you need a full-service plumbing company in Mississauga or nearby that will get the job done right on the first try, we’re the team to call.

Here are just a few of the benefits you’ll enjoy when you call us for everything, from minor plumbing issues to your most pressing plumbing emergencies:

Same-day emergency services
Licensed plumbers
Clean, professional technicians
High-quality materials
Competitive pricing
100% satisfaction guaranteed

Check us out here too:

profile:
At Drain King Plumbers, every customers needs are important. Our promise is to focus on your satisfaction and provide you with the solution that best fits your needs.
 
Drain King Plumbers -


Some of our Services include: Plumbing Repairs and Drain Service, Water Service Replacement, Building Drain Replacement, Video (Camera) Inspection of Drains/Sewers, High Pressure Water Jetting/Power Flushing, Trenchless Technology, Water Purification, Backwater Valve and Sump Pump, Waterproofing & Storm Drainage
We service locations near you: 
Toronto, North York, Scarborough, Etobicoke, Brampton, Mississauga, York Region, & Durham Region 

Drain King Plumbers gets the job done right, the first time. Always on-time, we work quickly and efficiently to make the experience as painless as possible. You can always count of us 24/7! You never have to clean up after a Drain King Technician, we will leave the work area as clean, or cleaner!

Call the go-to plumbing experts at Drain King Now! 416-661-KING(5464)

Same Price, Any Time, Any Day: No suprises or unexpected bills. Our flat rate pricing means no additional charges on evenings, weekends, and holidays.

At Drain King Plumbers, we believe that providing quality service at reasonable flat-rate prices give Toronto homeowners the confidence they need to make the right choice. 

Drain King Plumbers are experts at: 
* Basement Flood Prevention 
* Sewer Back-up/Flooded Basement
* Backwater Valve Installation 
* Sump Pump and Sewage Pumps
Drain & Sewer Specialists: 
* Drain Camera Inspection 
* Drain Snaking 
* Drain Cleaning 
* Hydro-flushing/scrubbing/Jetting (high pressure water drain cleaning clears blockages and restores your pipe to near new condition) 
* No Dig Trenchless Technology (remove those tree roots and replace broken clay pipes without the expense of digging up your yard) 


Need a plumber in Toronto or Greater Toronto Area? Call us at 416-661-KING(5464). Trust the plumbing and drain company people rely on. Call Drain King Plumbers! your satisfaction is always guaranteed!
PLUMBING & DRAIN SERVICES 
* Emergency Services: In a home plumbing emergency, you can count on Drain King Plumbers. With one simple phone call, you can significantly reduce stress and property damage that a sudden plumbing or drain issue can cause.
* Trenchless Pipe Repair: Call us before you decide to tear up your basement or landscaping! Our Trenchless methods could save you tens of thousands of dollars! We use quick, easy, reliable and permanent trenchless repair methods. 
* Damaged Sewer Lines: Cracked sewer pipes are a common source of costly property damage and potentially serious health issues for homeowners. Not to worry, Drain King Plumbers is right around the corner!
* Water Heater Replace/Repair: Hot water is essential in your showers, bathtubs, kitchen sinks, dishwashers and washing machines. 
* Water Softeners & Filters: With whole-house or under counter water softening/filtration equipment installed by Drain King, you know your water is safe.
* Sump Pump & Battery Backup Systems: A sump pump keeps your basement dry and mold free, but occasionally it can malfunction or become overwhelmed. Get a battery backup for peace of mind in the next heavy rainstorm. 
* Clogged Toilet Repair: Does your toilet clog or overflow? Be sure to fix the clog before it becomes a serious problem that can cause water damage and mold.
* Clogged Shower Repair: Is your shower slow draining? Have no fear! Drain King is here!
* Clogged Drain Repair: Clogged drains rarely get better on their own. Dont wait until is becomes a bigger issue! Call Now! 416-661-KING(5464)
* Frozen Pipe/Drain Repair: Is water gushing out of your ceiling or wall? It could be a burst pipe! Call us right away - to make the problem go away!
Drain King Plumbers - where every customer gets the Royal Treatment!
416-661-KING(5464)
www.drainkingplumbers.ca
info@drainkingplumbers.ca

profile:
About Us
At JDI Plumbing we are committed to providing our clients with the highest level of service.

We specialize in Residential Service and Construction, High and Low Rise Building Maintenance, and Commercial & Industrial plumbing solutions. 


Jesse Isakow - Master Plumber
Custom Homes | Renovations | Backflow Prevention

Jesse heads our Renovation and Custom Home Department with a focus on high end residential projects. Jesse has been working in the plumbing industry for over 15 years. His experience includes subdivision homes, commercial and industrial builds, residential renovations, commercial kitchen renovations, and more. Jesse currently manages our construction crew through custom home projects as well as installing, repairing, and testing Backflow Prevention Devices.


Eli Zlotnick - Master Plumber
Residential Service | Property Management | Renovations

Eli heads our Service and Property Management Department with a focus on high and low rise multi-residential and commercial service. Eli has been working in the plumbing industry for over 15 years. His experience includes subdivision homes, residential renovations, residential service, commercial service, and multi-residential service and property management. Eli currently manages our service team who service the GTA community as well as a multitude of multi-residential and commercial properties for local schools, organizations, and our Property Management clientele.

profile:
OUR LICENSED PLUMBERS WILL KEEP EVERYTHING FLOWING SMOOTHLY.

At RST Plumbing, we provide you the latest technology and we are devoting ourselves to provide the best quality, durable and affordable plumbing services.

Whether its be a new plumbing installation, emergency repair or consultation for a residential, commercial or an industrial property our dedicated team provides quality plumbing services. 

Everyone whether they are homeowners or building supervisors, think that plumbing and drainage are same. 
After all, they are just looking for someone to fix a leak. 
But there is a substantial difference. 
Drainage is an effective discharge of wastewater; whereas plumbing is the management of incoming water, So for that RST Plumbing is always ready for you to serve at the best.

Give us a call - 647-649-1614

profile:
Here at Grizzly Plumbing and Heating we are committed to making a pleasant atmosphere for all our customers, where we can apply our training and experience to make your household dreams a reality. Our polite and courteous staff will take the time to go over your options and alternatives when it comes to achieving your Plumbing, Heating and gas needs. We are a fully licensed and insured company and take pride in completing all jobs to current plumbing, heating and gas specifications. We insure the upmost quality is provided, and warranty all our work with customer satisfaction; guaranteed.  We utilize the latest in industry technology and equipment to improve your homes comfort and efficiency. 

***

Often plumbing complications are unexpected and require instant attention; our twenty-four-hour emergency contact line is always available for immediate response. Grizzly Plumbing and Heating technicians will diagnose the issue and provide you with prompt repair solutions. Our up-front pricing guide is designed to provide pricing transparency to our customers with no hidden fees.  Our commitment to customer service and quality assurance is what makes Grizzly Plumbing and Heating a top choice in the Greater Toronto Area.

***

PLUMBING:

***

At Grizzly Plumbing and Heating our priority is the comfort and safety of your home.  Our skilled technicians can handle any problem big or small, from a blocked main drain causing damage and noxious odors, to a dripping kitchen faucet.  We install all plumbing needs for your home from basic repairs to fully outfitting all new plumbing throughout your home. Whether it be a new or repaired bathroom shower, sink, vanity install, etc. we will ensure the work is completed efficiently and in a timely manner. Our fully stocked trucks carry a large variety of replacement parts to ensure a quick and guaranteed repair.  We work well with all contractors and are knowledgeable in reading blueprints.

***

DRAINS:

***

Main Drain Issues?

***

Toronto has many older neighborhoods, it’s not uncommon to find homes over a hundred years old.  Most older homes will have some original plumbing including clay main drains that handle all the homes waste water.  Cracks in the clay pipe, tree root penetration, and separation due to shifting are all very common issues that may lead to a main drain blockage.  At Grizzly Plumbing and Heating we know a blocked main drain can be an upsetting time for our customers as sewage coming up through a floor drain can be dangerous and hazardous to your health. Grizzly Plumbing and Heating utilizes modern technology when dealing with blocked main drains and sewers.  Our top priority is to get your drain flowing again by determining the root cause of the blockage.  Once the problem is identified our technician will present you with a solution and a cost. 
We will  clear the obstruction use a drain camera to identify damage and repairs.  Exterior drain problems on the front of your property can be costly to excavate, at Grizzly Plumbing and Heating we utilize technology that will often allow us to repair your problem without exposing all the piping.  We do this by utilizing a pipe lining technology.  We can “line” the existing pipe with a hard epoxy material and save you the hassle and expense of excavation. Should the main drain need replacing our certified team will expose the damaged section(s) and replace the piping with CSA approved material.  
Grizzly Plumbing and Heating is a City of Toronto approved installer.  This means we can access permits and the financial rebates the city offers. Taking advantage of the rebates can often alleviate a large portion of the overall repair cost.  All our underground pipe replacements and repairs come with a guarantee.  If the problem ever re-occurs in a previously repaired section we will repair it for FREE.

***

Heating:

At Grizzly Plumbing and Heating we are experts in Hydronic Heating “water based heating systems”, this type of heating system uses boilers, we do not work on forced air furnaces. Being certified plumbers and gas fitters, our technicians can help navigate the many complexities of a hydronic system. Our technitians are experts with the old boiler systems that are still common in Toronto. Boiler cleanings, and combustion analysis readings are by law required annually on all atmospheric boilers. This annual maintenance is to ensure the products of combustion never enter the home and dangerous levels of carbon monoxide are not being produced by the boiler. Upgrading your heating system can be a great way to limit the dangers of an old system and to save money on your gas bills. However, improvements must be done properly to ensure appropriate heat is achieved. Adding radiators or in-floor heating to a system that wasn’t initially designed for the extra loads can be a devastating mistake to fix; if done incorrectly. Grizzly Plumbing and Heating are experts in determining the size and number of radiators required to heat a home. We install or update all hydronic in floor heating. Since every home is unique it takes an experienced team like ours to devise the appropriate boiler configuration to fit your dwellings needs, while conforming to all TSSA code requirements. 

***

Gas:
With Hydro costs increasing more and more people are relying on the comfort and affordability of natural gas to heat their homes, prepare their food, and produce their domestic hot water. Grizzly Plumbing and Heating offers the installation of all gas piping required for indoor and outdoor appliances. Whether it is a new gas line to a barbeque, underground line to a pool heater, or just a new line to a gas stove, make sure the job is done safely and sized appropriately. After installation or repair of a gas line is completed, it is imperative the line be properly tested for leaks. In most cases this requires filling the line with an inert gas well above the normal operating pressure of the line, when done incorrectly this process can rupture the gas regulators on other appliances throughout your home.   Here at Grizzly Plumbing and Heating we are committed to adhering to all natural gas codes; your safety is our priority.

profile:
Drain Target is proudly considered as a number one company in GTA. Our team is all licensed and very knowledgeable as well as   we provide a high level of customer service. Being in business for many years serves as the result of our trouble shooting skills, we've seen it all. 
Whether it's a small fixture that needs to be fixed or a large project we can simply handle it all. We provide the most quality work for a very reasonable price. Our clients are always happy with our job because we care for their goods as if it was ours, the site is always clean even if you've done the renovation in your basement we know how to not distract it and leave as little damage as possible, or if you don't want to ruin your new driveway our latest tranchless technology will help us to replace pipe without tearing up your propperty. We specialize in all tipes of Drain and Plumbing wether it's above or under ground. 
Also we waterproof all tipes of basement and underground parking. Looking to upgrade your water quality and pressure you will be given a varieti of options regarding to a size and material of the pipe. We cooperate with City Of Toronto in order to bring you the rebate for total of $3400.00 for installation of a backwater valve, sump pump and disconnecting the downspots.
We will ensure that you are protected for a period of 25 years.
We also do many more projects,
Don't hesitate to call us whether you required an immediate assistance, looking for an estimate or a friendly advice we will be happy to help.
Drain Target Inc.

Every customer's individual needs are important to us at Mr. Rooter. Our focus is to provide a quality combination of plumbing and drain services and products. 
 
Mr. Rooter Plumbing COMPANY HELD LICENSES: TORONTO MASTER: P1735 TORONTO CONTRACTOR: T94-0239829  BRAMPTON MASTER: P1735 BRAMPTON CONTRACTOR: W99MP0386 98 


Our Services include: Full Service Plumbing and Complete Drain Service, Water-main Replacement, Building Drain Replacement, Video (Camera) Inspection of Drains, High-Pressure Water Jetting, Trench-less Technology, Water Purification, Licensed Backwater Valve and Sump Pump system installers, and testers; Septic Refurbishment.
  

We service locations near you:
Toronto, North York, Scarborough, Brampton, York Region, & Durham Region
 

Mr. Rooter Plumbing Toronto arrives on time, consults with you, and works rapidly and efficiently while respecting your Toronto home. Our courteous Toronto plumbing professionals don’t leave a mess for you to clean up. Your plumbing emergency repairs are done right for you the first time! It’s all part of our customer service-focused philosophy. Mr. Rooter Plumbing Toronto stands behind every service we provide.
 
Mr. Rooter Plumbing Toronto is THE emergency plumbing and drains service specialist to call for all your plumbing and drain work. For prompt emergency 24/7 service in Toronto call (416) 699-8623 now! 
 
The preferred choice for Toronto plumbing and drain cleaning! Our plumbing and drain specialists strive to provide the best plumbing Toronto has to offer:
 
1) Same Price, Any Time, Any Day: Never be surprised with an unexpected bill with our flat rate pricing. This means no additional charges on Saturdays, Sundays, nights, and holidays. We believe that providing quality service at reasonable flat-rate prices gives Toronto homeowners the confidence they need to make the right choice.

2) Plumbing Camera Inspections: Mr. Rooter Plumbing Toronto will show you the problem – even if it’s underground - so you can make an informed decision. Our professional Toronto plumbers take the time to ensure you understand the issues and what to expect. 

3) Upfront Pricing: Our Toronto plumbers always explain what they are going to do - before any plumbing or drain work starts. Don’t be caught off-guard with unexpected charges. We set the price and stick to it!. 
 
Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Toronto is there for you for all your plumbing, drain, flood prevention, and septic system needs. We are fully licensed, insured, and committed to the Mr. Rooter mission of providing each customer with expert workmanship. Look no further for Flood Prevention (backwater valves and sump pump systems), drain work (camera inspections, hydro flushing/drain cleaning, trenchless technology for plumbing pipe repair), and septic refurbishment services that are second-to-none.
 
Our commitment to great customer service has made Mr. Rooter the plumbing and drain company more people choose. We are committed to treating you, your property, and your possessions with the utmost respect. When you call Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Toronto, you know your plumbing and drain professional will arrive on time and treat your home or business like it is their own.
 
Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Toronto is expert at: 
- Basement Flood Prevention 
- Sewage Back-up/Flooded Basement
- Backwater Valve Installation 
- Sump and Sewage Pump Systems

Drain Specialists:
- TV Camera Drain Inspection
- Drain Snaking
- Drain Cleaning
- Hydro-flushing/scrubbing (high-pressure water drain cleaning clears blockages and makes your pipes last years longer)
- No Dig Trenchless Technology (remove those tree roots and replace broken clay pipes without the expense of digging up your yard)

Need a plumber in Toronto, Ontario? Call us at (416) 699-8623. Trust the plumbing and drain company more people rely on. Call the experts at Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Toronto Today! You’ll be glad you did! 
 

DRAIN & PLUMBING SERVICES
 

Backflow Prevention: Backflows happen due to a sudden change in water pressure, causing contaminants to flow into your home’s potable water supply. We install and repair residential backflow system to protect your home.
 

Emergency Residential Services: In a home plumbing emergency, you can count on Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Toronto ON. With one simple phone call, you can limit the stress and property damage that a sudden plumbing problem can cause.
 

Trenchless Pipe Repair: Before a messy and expensive catastrophe occurs, don’t you wish you could get your sewer repaired and re-piped? We use quick, easy, reliable and permanent trenchless repair methods.
 

Damaged Sewer Lines: Cracked sewer pipes are a common source of costly property damage and potentially serious health issues for homeowners in Toronto. Luckily, Mr. Rooter Plumbing is right in your neighbourhood to help!
 

Septic Systems: With a septic backup, you could end up with big costs to remediate any property damage and contamination, including environmental cleanup. Remember, Mr. Rooter Plumbing professionals are here to help.
 

Water Heater Install: Hot water is essential in your showers, bathtubs, kitchen sinks, dishwashers and washing machines. Count on hot water to be there every time you need it! Count on Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Toronto On.
 

Water Softener Install: With whole-house water softening equipment installed by Mr. Rooter Plumbing, you can put hard water headaches behind you.
 

WiFi Sump Pump Battery Backup System: A sump pump can keep your basement dry and free of mold, but it can malfunction or become overwhelmed. Get a WiFi ready battery backup for peace of mind in the next heavy rainstorm.
 

Clogged Toilet Repair: Does your toilet clog or overflow? Fix the clog before it becomes a serious problem that can cause a leak in your home. Our plumbing team will fix your clogged toilet issues. Contact us today.
 

Clogged Shower Repair: Is a clogged shower drain getting you down—or slowing you down—as you get ready for your busy day? Our plumbing professionals respond quickly to accommodate your schedule when you have an issue.
 

Clogged Drain Repair: Our courteous plumbing professionals always respect your home—and we always clean up after ourselves. You can call on us anytime, 24/7, in an emergency.
 

Water Heater Installation & Repair:  If you need a tankless water heater installation, or gas water heater installation, make sure to call the professionals! Your safety and satisfaction are our immediate priority. Contact us today!
 

Frozen Pipe Repair: Just one burst pipe in a home running at 15-30 litres per minute from a burst pipe can do tens of thousands of dollars damage in a manner matter of minutes. Call us to fix your frozen pipe issue.
 

We service locations near you:
Toronto, North York, Scarborough, Brampton, York Region, & Durham Region
